ObjectClass.Name: Vampire (Pharopod)
ObjectClass.Description:
VAMPIRE/PHAROPOD: Biological, stealth strike-bomber Very high damage against ground targets Excellent raider and bunker buster
Cloaked when not attacking Upgraded by C-Tech: auto-enables TSS when in danger

Objective.Name: Move
Objective.Details: \Move to specified location \Move Speed: 6 (aircraft)\Vision Range: 30, Aggro Radius: 20 \Invisible in Fog of War

Objective.Name: Attack
Objective.Details: Attack target or Attack-Move to location\Uncloaks to fire \[Weapons Avg Damage/10secs]\Gnd: 300, R 15, SR 2, Sta S

Objective.Name: Stop
Objective.Details: \Interrupt current objective\ \Return to idling or hold fire

Objective.Name: Patrol
Objective.Details: Hold CTRL and select up to 5 points to\continuously patrol around\Target one of your own units to HOLD\current position or select a single\location to HOLD that position

Objective.Name: Teleport
Objective.Details: Teleport to a specified location\or self-teleport within LOS range\Teleporters extend range and negate cost\ \Blocked by Temporal Soliton Shield (TSS)

Objective.Name: Chronoport
Objective.Details: Chronoport to a specified point in time\ \Recharges Shields 50%\Must not have a TSS

Objective.Name: Chronoport
Objective.Details: Not Available\ Requires C-Tech\ upgrade at the MOUND

Objective.Name: Regenerate Shields
Objective.Details: \Fully restores shields\ \Process duration: 16 s\Avoid using near combat

Objective.Name: Attack Ground
Objective.Details: \Fire continuously at a designated \ground location

ObjectClass.Name: Pharopod (Crashing!)
ObjectClass.Description:
Lookout!
This Pharopod is out of control!
Blow it up or run away before it hits something

Objective.Name: Move
Objective.Details: \Move to specified location \Move Speed: 6 (aircraft)\Vision Range: 30, Aggro Radius: 20 \Invisible in Fog of War
